folder.name: Global Functions
folder.tiptext: Functions that can be added to your script

action.name: goto
action.tiptext: Go to the specified frame of the movie

action.name: gotoAndPlay
action.tiptext: Go to the specified frame and play

action.name: gotoAndStop
action.tiptext: Go to the specified frame and stop

action.name: nextFrame
action.tiptext: Go to the next frame

action.name: prevFrame
action.tiptext: Go to the previous frame

action.name: nextScene
action.tiptext: Go to the next scene

action.name: prevScene
action.tiptext: Go to the previous scene

action.name: play
action.tiptext: Start playing the movie

action.name: stop
action.tiptext: Stop playing the movie

action.name: stopAllSounds
action.tiptext: Stop playing all sounds

action.name: ifFrameLoaded
action.tiptext: Performs actions only if a particular frame is loaded

folder.name: Browser/Network
folder.tiptext: Functions that control the Web browser and network

action.name: getURL
action.tiptext: Tell Web browser to navigate to specified URL

action.name: loadMovie
action.tiptext: Loads a SWF or JPEG from an URL into a movie clip

action.name: unloadMovie
action.tiptext: Unload a movie clip loaded with loadMovie

action.name: loadVariables
action.tiptext: Load variables from an URL

action.name: loadMovie
action.tiptext: Loads a SWF or JPEG from an URL into a movie clip

action.name: loadMovieNum
action.tiptext: Loads a SWF or JPEG from an URL into a level

action.name: loadVariables
action.tiptext: Load variables from an URL

action.name: loadVariablesNum
action.tiptext: Load variables from an URL into a level

action.name: unloadMovie
action.tiptext: Unload a movie clip loaded with loadMovie

action.name: unloadMovieNum
action.tiptext: Unload a movie clip loaded with loadMovieNum

action.name: on
action.tiptext: Performs actions when a particular mouse event occurs

action.name: setProperty
action.tiptext: Set a property of a movie clip

action.name: duplicateMovieClip
action.tiptext: Make a duplicate of a movie clip

action.name: removeMovieClip
action.tiptext: Removes a movie clip created with duplicateMovieClip

action.name: getProperty
action.tiptext: Returns a property of the specified movie clip

string.name: set
string.tiptext: Assigns a value to a variable

string.name: chr
string.tiptext: Convert an ASCII code to a character

string.name: int
string.tiptext: Extract the integer part of a number

string.name: mbchr
string.tiptext: Convert an ASCII/S-JIS code to a character (multibyte aware)

string.name: mbord
string.tiptext: Convert a character to an ASCII/S-JIS code (multibyte aware)

string.name: ord
string.tiptext: Convert a character to an ASCII code

string.name: Number
string.tiptext: Converts argument to type number

string.name: String
string.tiptext: Converts argument to type string

string.name: eval
string.tiptext: Returns value of variable named by the expresssion

string.name: getTimer
string.tiptext: The number of milliseconds since the movie started playing

string.name: length
string.tiptext: Calculate the length of the string

string.name: mblength
string.tiptext: Calculate the length of the string (multibyte aware)

string.name: mbsubstring
string.tiptext: Extract count characters from string, starting at index'th character (multibyte aware)

string.name: random
string.tiptext: Generate a random number between 0 and specified number

string.name: substring
string.tiptext: Extract count characters from string, starting at index'th character

action.name: trace
action.tiptext: Sends a message to the Output window

action.name: comment
action.tiptext: Insert a comment to help document your script

string.name: _alpha
string.tiptext: Alpha transparency (percentage)

string.name: _currentframe
string.tiptext: Returns the frame number where the playhead is currently located

string.name: _focusrect
string.tiptext: Returns false if tab focus rectangles are hidden, true if displayed

string.name: _framesloaded
string.tiptext: Returns the number of frames loaded from a streaming movie

string.name: _highquality
string.tiptext: Returns false if low quality, true if high quality

string.name: _level
string.tiptext: Returns the numbered level

string.name: maxscroll
string.tiptext: Maximum value of .scroll in text field

string.name: _name
string.tiptext: Instance name

string.name: _rotation
string.tiptext: Angle of rotation (degrees)

string.name: scroll
string.tiptext: Index of first visible line in text field

string.name: _target
string.tiptext: Target path

string.name: _totalframes
string.tiptext: Returns the total number of frames in the movie

string.name: _visible
string.tiptext: Returns true if the button is visible, false if hidden

string.name: _x
string.tiptext: X Position

string.name: _xscale
string.tiptext: X Scale Factor (percentage)

string.name: _y
string.tiptext: Y Position

string.name: _yscale
string.tiptext: Y Scale Factor (percentage)

action.name: call
action.tiptext: Call a subroutine in a specified frame

action.name: toggleHighQuality
action.tiptext: Toggles between low and high quality

action.name: tellTarget
action.tiptext: Within tellTarget, actions operate on targeted movie clip

action.name: if
action.tiptext: Performs actions if a condition is true

action.name: else
action.tiptext: Inside if, perform actions if condition is false

action.name: else if
action.tiptext: Inside if, perform actions if alternate condition is true

action.name: while
action.tiptext: Perform actions while the condition is true.

action.name: break
action.tiptext: Break out of the enclosing loop

action.name: continue
action.tiptext: Continue at the start of the enclosing loop

action.name: do while
action.tiptext: Do While Loop

action.name: for
action.tiptext: For Loop

action.name: switch
action.tiptext: Performs a block of code based on a condition

action.name: case
action.tiptext: Identifies a block of code inside a 'switch' statement

string.tiptext: Put double quotes around string literals in an expression
Use parentheses to group expressions, i.e. (x+y)*z
Add numbers
Increments a variable. Example: x++, ++y
Subtract numbers
Decrements a variable. Example: x--, --y
Multiply numbers
Divides first number by the second number
Calculate the remainder of x divided by y
Test equality
Test inequality
Less than
Greater than
Less than or equal to
Greater than or equal to

string.name: ge
string.tiptext: Greater than or equal to (strings)

string.name: gt
string.tiptext: Greater than (strings)

string.name: eq
string.tiptext: Test equality (strings)

string.name: le
string.tiptext: Less than or equal to (strings)

string.name: ne
string.tiptext: Test inequality (strings)

string.name: lt
string.tiptext: Less than (strings)
Short-circuit logical AND operator
Short-circuit logical OR operator
Logical NOT operator

string.name: and
string.tiptext: Logical AND
Store the value of B in A
Store the sum A + B in A
Store the value A - B in A
Stores the value A * B in A
Stores the quotient A / B in A
Stores the remainder A % B in A

string.name: add
string.tiptext: Concatenates strings together
Conditional operator. Example: a ? b : c

folder.name: FSCommand2
folder.tiptext: Used to access mobile phone's features

string.name: Escape
string.tiptext: Encodes a string in URL format

string.name: FullScreen
string.tiptext: Sets the size of the display area to be used for rendering

string.name: GetBatteryLevel
string.tiptext: Returns the current battery level

string.name: GetDateDay
string.tiptext: Returns the day of the current date

string.name: GetDateMonth
string.tiptext: Returns the month of the current date

string.name: GetDateWeekday
string.tiptext: Returns the numeric value of the name of the day of the current date

string.name: GetDateYear
string.tiptext: Returns the numeric value of the year of the current date

string.name: GetDevice
string.tiptext: Identifies the mobile phone on which Flash is running

string.name: GetDeviceID
string.tiptext: Sets a parameter that represents the unique identifier of the mobile phone

string.name: GetFreePlayerMemory
string.tiptext: Returns the amount of memory in kilobytes available to Flash Lite

string.name: GetLanguage
string.tiptext: Sets a parameter that identifies the language used by the mobile phone

string.name: GetLocaleLongDate
string.tiptext: Sets a parameter to a string representing the current date in long form

string.name: GetLocaleShortDate
string.tiptext: Sets a parameter to a string representing the current date in abbreviated form

string.name: GetLocaleTime
string.tiptext: Sets a parameter to a string representing the current time

string.name: GetMaxBatteryLevel
string.tiptext: Returns the current battery level

string.name: GetMaxSignalLevel
string.tiptext: Returns the maximum signal strength level

string.name: GetMaxVolumeLevel
string.tiptext: Returns the maximum volume level of the mobile phone

string.name: GetNetworkConnectStatus
string.tiptext: Returns a value indicating the current network connection status

string.name: GetNetworkName
string.tiptext: Sets a parameter to the name of the current network

string.name: GetNetworkRequestStatus
string.tiptext: Returns a value indicating the status of the most recent HTTP request

string.name: GetNetworkStatus
string.tiptext: Returns a value indicating the network status of the phone

string.name: GetPlatform
string.tiptext: Identifies the current platform

string.name: GetPowerSource
string.tiptext: Returns a value indicating if the power source is battery or external

string.name: GetSignalLevel
string.tiptext: Returns the current signal strength

string.name: GetTimeHours
string.tiptext: Returns the hour of the current time of day, based on a 24-hour clock

string.name: GetTimeMinutes
string.tiptext: Returns the minute of the current time of day

string.name: GetTimeSeconds
string.tiptext: Returns the second of the current time of day

string.name: GetTimeZoneOffset
string.tiptext: Sets a parameter comparing the local time zone and the UTC

string.name: GetTotalPlayerMemory
string.tiptext: Returns the total amount of memory in kilobytes

string.name: GetVolumeLevel
string.tiptext: Returns the current volume level of the mobile phone

string.name: ResetSoftKeys
string.tiptext: Resets the softkeys to their original settings

string.name: SetInputTextType
string.tiptext: Specifies the mode in which the input text field should be opened

string.name: SetQuality
string.tiptext: Sets the quality of the rendering of the animation

string.name: SetSoftKeys
string.tiptext: Used to remap the left and right softkeys of the mobile phones

string.name: StartVibrate
string.tiptext: Starts the phone's vibration

string.name: StopVibrate
string.tiptext: Stops the phone's vibration

string.name: Unescape
string.tiptext: Decodes a string in URL format

string.name: Quit
string.tiptext: Causes Flash Lite to stop playback and exit

folder.name: FSCommand
folder.tiptext: Used to access mobile phone's features

action.name: Launch
action.tiptext: Starts another application on the mobile phone

folder.name: Capabilities
folder.tiptext: Used to determine mobile phone's capabilities

string.name: _capCompoundSound
string.tiptext: Indicates whether Flash Lite can process compound sound data

string.name: _capEmail
string.tiptext: Indicates whether Flash Lite can send e-mail messages

string.name: _capMMS
string.tiptext: Indicates whether Flash Lite can send MMS messages

string.name: _capSMS
string.tiptext: Indicates whether Flash Lite can send SMS messages

string.name: _capMFi
string.tiptext: Indicates whether the device can play MFi sound

string.name: _capMIDI
string.tiptext: Indicates whether the device can play MIDI sound

string.name: _capSMAF
string.tiptext: Indicates whether the device can play SMAF sound

string.name: _capMP3
string.tiptext: Indicates whether the device can play MP3 sound

string.name: _capStreamSound
string.tiptext: Indicates whether the device can play streaming sound

string.name: _capLoadData
string.tiptext: Indicates whether the host application can dynamically load data

string.name: _cap4WayKeyAS
string.tiptext: Indicates if Flash Lite executes ActionScript attached to directional keys

string.name: $version
string.tiptext: Contains the version number of Flash Lite
